Men's Chest Size Conversion Chart

Find the perfect fit for your shirts, jackets, and suits with our chest size conversion chart. This guide helps you convert between inches and centimeters, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit for any upper body wear.

Size Inches Centimeters
XS 32-34 81-86
S 35-37 89-94
M 38-40 97-102
L 41-43 104-109
XL 44-46 112-117
XXL 47-49 119-124

How to Measure Your Chest Size

  1. Use a flexible tape measure.
  2. Wrap the tape measure around the fullest part of your chest, typically at nipple level.
  3. Keep the tape measure level and snug, but not tight.
  4. Take a deep breath and then exhale. Measure at the end of the exhale.
  5. Record the measurement and use the chart above to find your chest size.

Note: When buying fitted shirts or jackets, consider allowing an extra inch or two for comfort and movement.
